<div class="project-list">

    <!-- Publications will be loaded here by JavaScript -->
    <li class="project" data-year="2025">
      <div class="project-container">
        <div class="project-content">
          <div class="project-title">
            <span class="pub-type-badge pub-type-conference">Conference</span>
            <a href="#">Loading publications...</a>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Year filter functionality
  const yearButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.year-filter .btn');
  const publications = document.querySelectorAll('.project-list li.project');

  yearButtons.forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      // Remove active class from all buttons
      yearButtons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
      // Add active class to clicked button
      this.classList.add('active');

      const selectedYear = this.getAttribute('data-year');

      publications.forEach(pub => {
        if (selectedYear === 'all' || pub.getAttribute('data-year') === selectedYear) {
          pub.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
          pub.style.display = 'none';
        }
      });
    });
  });
});
</script>
